name: Taken Souls: Blood Ritual - Platinum Edition
summary: Play Taken Souls - Blood Ritual and solve a mind-bending hidden object case! Centuries ago, the worlds of Magic and Technology were divided. Years later, someone tries to reunite them. An earth shattering clash with the Keeper of the World of Magic ensues. Lives are taken and more are at stake. Will you, detective Farrell, determine the world's fate? Solve the case in Taken Souls - Blood Ritual!
